item.title: Fran add a quote by E. Lockhart
item.description: "He was contemplation and enthusiasm. Ambition and strong coffee. I could have looked at him forever." -- E. Lockhart

item.title: Fran add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Fran add a quote by E. Lockhart
item.description:
"It is better to be alone, she figures, than to be with someone who can't see who you are. It is better to lead than to follow. It is better to speak up than stay silent. It is better to open doors than to shut them on people.
She will not be simple and sweet. She will not be what people tell her to be. That Bunny Rabbit is dead." -- E. Lockhart

item.title: Fran add a quote by Rainbow Rowell
item.description: "You can be Han Solo," he said, kissing her throat. "And I'll be Boba Fett. I'll cross the sky for you." -- Rainbow Rowell

item.title: Fran add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "Really, being a librarian is a much more dangerous job than you realize." -- Libba Bray

item.title: Fran add a quote by Catherynne M. Valente
item.description: "She sounds like someone who spends a lot of time in libraries, which are the best sorts of people." -- Catherynne M. Valente
